FAIL_TO_PASS: when implicit help option then help option not affected
when short flag obscured then help term is --help
when helpOption has custom description then helpInformation include custom description
when both help flags masked then not displayed in helpInformation
when help flags obscured then implicit help hidden
styleOptionDescription
styleOptionText
when default then help term is -h, --help
when set width 12 (and set minWrapWidth) then skip wrap
when helpOption has just flags then helpInformation includes default description
when long flag obscured then help term is --h
when just implicit help option returns length of help flags
end-to-end: when option description is preformatted then manual format is preserved
when set width 41 then wrap at 41
when .helpOption(flags) then help option in group
when help short flag masked then not displayed in helpInformation
when .helpOption(true) then help option in group
styleOptionTerm
when call helpInformation for program then help format is as expected (usage, options, commands)
when helpOption has just description then helpInformation includes default flags
